Ghosty.setFees(uint256,uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c39a00d29851bad62e63601cbde12053fe233bd1_Ghosty.sol#303-309) should emit an event for: 
	- liquidityFee = _liquidityFee (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c39a00d29851bad62e63601cbde12053fe233bd1_Ghosty.sol#304) 
	- marketingFee = _marketingFee (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c39a00d29851bad62e63601cbde12053fe233bd1_Ghosty.sol#305) 
	- totalFee = _liquidityFee.add(_marketingFee) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c3/c39a00d29851bad62e63601cbde12053fe233bd1_Ghosty.sol#306)
